data.name: Vagrus - The Riven Realms Patronage Pack
data.detailed_description:
Vagrus - The Riven Realms was born out of our love for our peculiar pen-and-paper campaign setting and the desire to share it with more people in the form of a hardcore, story-rich, strategy RPG. We aim to continue working on the game, creating additional content in the form of DLCs and improving the game with regular updates.

This Patronage DLC is a contribution towards the cause of keeping Vagrus alive if you feel that our little team is worthy of support.

As a token of our appreciation, we created a humble package of digital goodies in return for your patronage:

  • Digital Wallpapers Pack
  • Digital Chart of the Continent of Xeryn
  • Digital Art Booklet [38 pages of Vagrus art]
  • Unlocks a Unique in-game banner.

Thank you for your support. It matters a lot to us.
The Lost Pilgrims Team
